<style type="text/css">
.tg  {border-collapse:collapse;border-color:#93a1a1;border-spacing:0;}
.tg td{background-color:#fdf6e3;border-color:#93a1a1;border-style:solid;border-width:1px;color:#002b36;
  font-family:Arial, sans-serif;font-size:14px;overflow:hidden;padding:10px 5px;word-break:normal;}
.tg th{background-color:#657b83;border-color:#93a1a1;border-style:solid;border-width:1px;color:#fdf6e3;
  font-family:Arial, sans-serif;font-size:14px;font-weight:normal;overflow:hidden;padding:10px 5px;word-break:normal;}
.tg .tg-odgh{background-color:#FDF6E3;color:#002B36;text-align:left;vertical-align:top}
.tg .tg-h45s{background-color:#657B83;color:#FDF6E3;font-weight:bold;text-align:center;vertical-align:top}
.tg .tg-oj1a{background-color:#FDF6E3;color:#002B36;font-weight:bold;text-align:center;vertical-align:middle}
.tg .tg-r2ta{background-color:#FDF6E3;color:#002B36;font-weight:bold;text-align:center;vertical-align:top}
.tg .tg-qve5{background-color:#FDF6E3;color:#002B36;text-align:center;vertical-align:top}
.tg .tg-w0xc{background-color:#FDF6E3;color:#002B36;font-weight:bold;text-align:left;vertical-align:top}
</style>
<table class="tg">
<thead>

  <tr>
    <td class="tg-r2ta" colspan="2"><span style="font-weight:bold">Objetivo</span></td>
    <td class="tg-odgh"><span style="font-weight:normal">Subsidiar políticas relacionadas à otimização da infraestrutura, à</span><br><span style="font-weight:normal"> sustentabilidade ambiental e à dinamicidade do espaço urbano</span></td>

  <tr>

  <tr>

  <tr>
    <td class="tg-w0xc"><span style="font-weight:bold">Fonte</span></td>

  <tr>
